# Caster

用于调用move函数的合约。

# Demo
## Transfer
cargo run -- tx -m transfer -k 0x4db4ef1992889d4428e400be3428843db6e89bb2e8aaf4ce8efe00df64012544 -r 0xd0b56296877f8acefdefef06569751d8587f8f5df255179957086012b4fb7d20 -v 310 -s 0 > code
